statement.p: Find the point of intersection of the lines y = x + 1 and 2x+3y=14\text{.}

image.description: a graph with axes depicting two intersecting lines

statement.p: The point of intersection is (x,y) where x= and y=.
The solution of the linear system

Suppose a jar contains red, blue and green marbles. You are told that there are a total of {48} marbles in the jar; there are twice as many red marbles as green ones; the number of blue marbles is the same as the sum of the red and green marbles. How many marbles of each color are there?
Use the method of elimination to solve the linear system:
The solution is x= and y=.
Use the method of elimination to solve the linear system:
The solution is x_1=, x_2= and x_3=.
Write the augmented matrix of the system
Write the augmented matrix of the system

li.p: Which of the following correctly describes the matrix above?
The matrix is 3\times 5, with 3 rows and 5 columns.
The matrix is 5\times 3, with 5 columns and 3 rows.
The matrix is 3\times 5, with 3 columns and 5 rows.
The matrix is 5\times 3, with 5 rows and 3 columns.
Now consider an {3} \times {9} matrix B\text{.} If B is an augmented matrix, the corresponding linear system has how many variables?

statement.p: Convert the augmented matrix below to the associated linear system.
Use x\text{,} y\text{,} and z for the variables.
